data.label: Import
data.description: Import settings from a JSON file

data.label: Export
data.description: Export your current settings to a JSON file

data.label: Reset
data.description: Reset all settings to their default values. You will lose your current configuration!

data.label: Info
data.description: Data managed: Tuning, Audio, and Video. Controls are not affected. Beware of importing incorrect JSON files.
